Title: Episode #4.2
Writer: Simon Burke, Michael J. Bassett, Tim Vaughan, Chris Ryan (based on the book by)
Actors: Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Rhona Mitra, Robson Green
Plot: After the Kamali escape, Section 20 tries to capture him by breaking into his safety deposit box in a downtown Bogata bank. Dalton continues to track down the people in Beirut who gave her up.
